::: {#thm-pythagoras}
#### Pythagoras's Theorem
In a right triangle, the lengths of the two shorter sides $a$, $b$ and the longer side $c$ stand in the relation
$$
a^2 + b^2 = c^2.
$$
:::

See @thm-pythagoras for details.
